MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:01am. Our engineers have arrived at Boughden Wood substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00am. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:35am on Wednesday, 14 October 2020
